summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5582 for the improvement of 31st Avenue West, from West Ray Street to a point 200 feet, more or less, north of West Armour Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73306, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
